content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings, Maryam. While I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Magdeburg, let me first emphasize that finding an optimal rental price alignment is crucial for me. Now, let us begin negotiating the rental amount without disclosing additional details at this stage.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello Maryam, since the apartment is unfurnished and in the city center, I'd like to start with an amount of 800 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I regret to say but I don't want to continue the negotiation at this proposed price due to my desire to maximize returns on my investment, Maryam.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Maryam. How about we lower that to 750 euros per month?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of 750 Euro!_TERMINATE_
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
